body:
Its a variation for ctw just like nebula has a tdm .where u puch a minecart  from the beginning off the map to the other side.
the other team  needs to prevent that the other team pushes the car all the way to the other side of the map.
the team who is pushing the car gets regeneration 1 by standing very close to the car.
The team who pushes the car cant be 1 block in front of the car so they cant push it back
the other team can push the car back.
the team who pushes the car needs to get the car to the other side of the map the other team needs to prevent that.
if the team who pushes the car does not make it in time they lose and the other team wins.



if u play tf2 u know what i mean

replies.body:
How will you prevent people from riding the minecart? Just asking if that's possible with the YML... Not to mention people could try and break the tracks, or place blocks that will block the minecart.

But if this is possible, it would be pretty cool and somewhat original in terms of Minecraft. I like it!
